# Generated by ModuleTarget.py
# Remove a "#" from the line below to stop generating this file every time you call CoreWorkspace generate
## TARGET MODULE usb

PROJECT( usb_ros_serial )
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED( VERSION 2.8 )

FIND_PACKAGE( CORE_BUILD CONFIG REQUIRED )

INCLUDE ( CoreTarget NO_POLICY_SCOPE )

SET( BOOTLOADER_SIZE 16384 )
SET( CONFIGURATION_SIZE 2048 )

SET( PROJECT_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES
  ros_lib
)

SET( PROJECT_SOURCES
  main.cpp
  ros_lib/duration.cpp
  ros_lib/time.cpp
)

core_target_module(
  MODULE usb
  OS_VERSION CHIBIOS_16
  PACKAGES
    common_msgs
    led
    joint
    edo_msgs
    control_msgs
)
